tit.e: Tsukigase Village (a village that once existed in Nara Prefecture)
Tsukigase Village (a village that once existed in Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 月ヶ瀬村（つきがせむら）は、かつて奈良県に存在した村。
sen.e: Tsukigase-mura Village was a village that once existed in Nara Prefecture.
Tsukigase Village was a village that once existed in Nara Prefecture.
Tsukigase Village was a village that once existed in Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 2005年4月1日、山辺郡都祁村とともに奈良市へ編入されたことから消滅した。
sen.e: On April 1, 2005, Tsukigase-mura village was incorporated by Nara City, together with Tsuge-mura, Yamabe district.
On April 1, 2005, Tsukigase Village was incorporated by Nara City, together with Tsuge Village, Yamabe County.
On April 1, 2005, Tsukigase Village was incorporated by Nara City, together with Tsuge Village, Yamabe County.

sen.j: 現在の奈良市月ヶ瀬に当たる。
sen.e: It corresponds to Present day Tsukigase, Nara City.
It corresponds to present-day Tsukigase, Nara City.
It corresponds to present-day Tsukigase, Nara City.

sen.j: 地理
sen.e: Geography
Geography
Geography

sen.j: 奈良県の北東端に位置し、村内を名張川が東西に流れ、渓谷の様相を呈している。
sen.e: It is located in the eastern edge of Nara Prefecture, and Nabari-gawa River horizontally flows across the village, looking like a ravine.
It is located in the northeastern edge of Nara Prefecture, and the Nabari-gawa River horizontally flows across the village, looking like a ravine.
It is located in the northeastern edge of Nara Prefecture, and the Nabari-gawa River horizontally flows across the village, looking like a ravine.

sen.j: ウメの名所であり、見頃を迎えると遠方からも多くの観光客が訪れる。
sen.e: It is a plum tree viewing spot, and there are many visitors from a long distance when plum trees are in bloom.
It is famous as plum tree viewing spot, and there are many visitors from a long distance when plum trees are in bloom.
It is famous as plum tree viewing spot, and there are many visitors from a long distance when plum trees are in bloom.

sen.j: 茶の産地としても知られ、初夏になれば新緑が斜面を鮮やかに彩る。
sen.e: It is also known as a production area of tea, fresh green leaves cover slopes in the beginning of summer.
It is also known as a production area of tea, fresh green leaves cover slopes brightly in the beginning of summer.
It is also known as a production area of tea, fresh green leaves cover slopes brightly in the beginning of summer.

sen.j: 経済面では三重県伊賀市（旧・上野市）との結びつきが強い。
sen.e: Economically, it has a strong tie with Iga City, Mie Prefecture (the former Ueno City).
Economically, it has a strong tie with Iga City, Mie Prefecture (the former Ueno City).
Economically, it has a strong tie with Iga City, Mie Prefecture (the former Ueno City).

sen.j: 1998年2月1日までは山添村の大半とともに郵便番号が三重県側の518～だった。
sen.e: Until February 1, 1998, together with the most part of Yamazoe-mura Village, its zip code was the number that begins with 518, which indicates that it belongs to Mie Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Until February 1, 1998, together with the most part of Yamazoe Village, the zip code was the number that begins with 518, which indicates that it belongs to Mie Prefecture.
Until February 1, 1998, together with the most part of Yamazoe Village, the zip code was the number that begins with 518, which indicates that it belongs to Mie Prefecture.

sen.j: 7桁化に際して普通郵便局が四日市西郵便局から奈良中央郵便局へ移管され奈良県側の630～となった。
sen.e: Before zip code was changed to be a 7-digit number, its common post office was transferred from Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office to Nara Central Post Office, and its zip code turned out to be the number that begins with 630, which indicates it belongs to Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Before zip code was changed to be a 7-digit number, its common post office was transferred from Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office to Nara Central Post Office, and its zip code turned out to be the number that begins with 630, which indicates it belongs to Nara Prefecture.

Before zip code was changed to be a 7-digit number, its common post office was transferred from Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office to Nara Central Post Office, and its zip code turned out to be the number that begins with 630, which indicates it belongs to Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 現在、近畿地方2府4県において四日市西郵便局管轄なのは和歌山県東牟婁郡北山村だけである。
sen.e: Today, out of six prefectures in Kinki region, only Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture is placed under the administration of Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office.
Today, out of six prefectures in Kinki region, only Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture is placed under the administration of Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Today, out of six prefectures in Kinki region, only Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture is placed under the administration of Yokkaichi-Nishi Post Office.
